channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #ShehnaazGill’s #viralvideo da
item.description: #ShehnaazGill’s #viralvideo dancing to #VickyKaushal and Karan Aujla’s #TaubaTauba reminded fans of the time she got a tattoo of the Punjabi singer

item.title: Newsroom editor at #Bangladesh
item.description: Newsroom editor at #Bangladesh's Gazi TV, #SarahRahanuma, was found dead in a lake in #Dhaka. Meanwhile, ousted ex-PM #SheikhHasina's US-based son, #SajeebWazed, said it was another brutal attack on #freedomofexpression Find out why on the link in bio #Journalist #BangladeshCrisis

item.title: We're going to swing 36 floors
item.description: We're going to swing 36 floors above #Berlin's #Alexanderplatz. #HTDWPartnership #HTDW #DWTravel #alexanderplatz #Berlinstagram
